entry.title: NATO Estimates Steep Russian Losses in Ukraine as Biden Heads to Europe
entry.content: Alliance officials say Russia may have lost as much as one-fifth of its combat forces in about a month of fighting in Ukraine, and alliance leaders are gathering for a summit in Brussels to discuss further support to Kyiv.

entry.title: Many Businesses Are Quitting Russia. Big French Firms Are Staying Put.
entry.content: Some of Franceâ€™s largest companies, including Renault, Societe Generale and TotalEnergies, are maintaining ties in Russia after its invasion of Ukraine.
